column1: Little Goat Diner////Service was fantastic and attentive after my order was taken. The Bloody Mary came out first (first time hearing of a Bloody Mary with kimchi). It was a delicious with the spiciness hitting at the end of each sip. This Little Piggy Went to China met my expectations; an awesome take of a Chinese inspired savory breakfast dish (the spices really stood out to me). The french toast was so soft and melt in your mouth
column2: and the breaded chicken on top and egg in the middle was a nice twist. The most mundane item was the fries; there's nothing special or smoky about these smoked fries
column3: but they were great fries in terms of taste and texture nonetheless.
